name: Dameon BROME, Petitioner v. DEPARTMENT OF CORRECTIONS, Respondent

parties: Dameon BROME, Petitioner v. DEPARTMENT OF CORRECTIONS, Respondent.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
AND NOW, this 14th day of September, 2010, the Petition for Review and the “Motion in Supreme Court for Injunction Denying Appeal from Order Dismissing Petition for Review and Denying Preliminary Injunction” are DENIED.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.

casebody.head_matter:
4 A.3d 608
Dameon BROME, Petitioner v. DEPARTMENT OF CORRECTIONS, Respondent.
No. 76 EM 2010.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Sept. 14, 2010.
